document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2009-04
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON APPROVING THE ADDENDUM TO THE NAPA COUNTY AIRPORT SPECIFIC PLAN EIR AND ADOPTING ZONE CHANGE PRE08-0001 TO PREZONE THE PANATTONI, HEADWATERS AND ATKINS PROPERTIES IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE NAPA COUNTY AIRPORT INDUSTRIAL AREA SPECIFIC PLAN
